official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to engrave and print the currency, bonds, and other security documents of a foreign country or engage in research and development for printing the currency, bonds, and other security documents on behalf of a foreign country on a reimbursable basis.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury, after apprising the Secretary of State, to engrave and print currency and other security documents or engage in related research and development for a foreign country on a reimbursable basis, provided that such activity does not interfere with the Bureau of Engraving and Printing domestic production.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to engrave and print the currency, bonds, and other security documents of a foreign country or engage in research and development for printing the currency, bonds, and other security documents on behalf of a foreign country on a reimbursable basis.
